about_the_game:
Try to survive the first location of the game Help me please. Beware of traps, mines and zombies, remember - it's all against you here.

If you suddenly feel an acute shortage of ammo, then you're wasting ammo in vain. Remember, there's always a knife.

When using the knife, remember, you only have one life and you can't replenish it, and letting zombies get close enough to you is a bad idea.

Use traps to your advantage. Kill zombies with them.

There are five types of weapons available in the level:
- Automatic rifle.
- Pistol
- Grenade
- Knife
- Sniper rifle (difficult to find, but it kills any normal zombie with the first shot)

Each weapon has its own type of ammo. Some ammo for other weapons that are not available in the demo.

Your feedback and suggestions for changes to the game would be very much appreciated. For all questions you can use our mail wwynoficial@gmail.com

content_descriptors.notes:
In the game you can shoot at zombies, zombie dogs and other monsters. There is blood in the game, there is dismemberment of zombies, shooting off limbs and exploding bodies from land mines.
In the game the player can be injured, bitten, blown up, trapped, killed by stakes, crushed by massive structures, and killed in many other ways. 
But there are no drugs or sex in the game. There is no torture or violence against living people in the game.

name: Help me please Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: tel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
